title_teim: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Broadcast, parts 5-8.
title_ssm: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Broadcast, parts 5-8.
title_si: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Broadcast, parts 5-8.
label_teim: 16th Annual Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony Tape 2 of 2 (Segments 5-8) Air Date: 3/21/01
label_ssm: 16th Annual Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony Tape 2 of 2 (Segments 5-8) Air Date: 3/21/01
summary_teim: Solomon Burke, Paul Simon, the Flamingos, and Chris Blackwell are inducted in the VH1 broadcast of the 2001 ceremony. Includes performances by Paul Simon, The Flamingos, Mary J. Blige, Bono, Melissa Etheridge, Aerosmith, and a jam with Johnnie Jones, James Burton, and Solomon Burke.
summary_ssm: Solomon Burke, Paul Simon, the Flamingos, and Chris Blackwell are inducted in the VH1 broadcast of the 2001 ceremony. Includes performances by Paul Simon, The Flamingos, Mary J. Blige, Bono, Melissa Etheridge, Aerosmith, and a jam with Johnnie Jones, James Burton, and Solomon Burke.
contents_teim: Mary J. Blige inducts Solomon Burke -- Solomon Burke accepts his award --  Graceland (Paul Simon) -- Marc Anthony inducts Paul Simon -- Paul Simon accepts his award -- Frankie Valli inducts the Flamingos -- The Flamingos accept their award -- I only have eyes for you (the Flamingos) -- Bono inducts Chris Blackwell -- Chris Blackwell accepts his award -- Could you be loved ; Get up stand up (Mary J. Blige, Bono, and Melissa Etheridge) -- The train kept a rollin' (Aerosmith) -- Me and Julio down by the schoolyard (Paul Simon with Dion) -- Jam. Johnnie's boogie (Johnnie Jones, James Burton) ; Everybody needs somebody to love (Solomon Burke, Kid Rock, Keith Richards).
contents_ssm: Mary J. Blige, Bono, and Melissa Etheridge) -- The train kept a rollin' (Aerosmith) -- Me and Julio down by the schoolyard (Paul Simon with Dion) -- Jam. Johnnie's boogie (Johnnie Jones, James Burton) ; Everybody needs somebody to love (Solomon Burke, Kid Rock, Keith Richards).

abstract_ssm: Mary J. Blige inducts Solomon Burke -- Solomon Burke accepts his award -- Graceland (Paul Simon) -- Marc Anthony inducts Paul Simon -- Paul Simon accepts his award -- Frankie Valli inducts the Flamingos -- The Flamingos accept their award -- I only have eyes for you (the Flamingos) -- Bono inducts Chris Blackwell -- Chris Blackwell accepts his award -- Could you be loved ; Get up stand up (Mary J. Blige, Bono, and Melissa Etheridge) -- The train kept a rollin' (Aerosmith) -- Me and Julio down by the schoolyard (Paul Simon with Dion) -- Jam. Johnnie's Boogie (Johnnie Johnson with James Burton, Robbie Robertson, Joe Perry, Tom Hamilton, Brad Whitford, Brian May, and Keith Richards) -- Everybody needs somebody to love (Solomon Burke and Kid Rock join the jam session).
